20110101020729.000|20110101020730.000|CC1|HAWTHORNE, CALIFORNIA HAS NOT

20110101020731.000|20110101020733.000|CC1|ILLNESSES.

20110101020802.000|20110101020804.000|CC1|CLOSE AT 11,577.

20110101020816.000|20110101020818.000|CC1|>> Suarez: AS THE YEAR COMES TO 
20110101020818.000|20110101020820.000|CC1|A CLOSE, WE GET THE LATEST ON   
20110101020820.000|20110101020821.000|CC1|ONE OF THE YEAR'S MAJOR STORIES-
20110101020821.000|20110101020822.000|CC1|- THE MASSIVE OIL SPILL ALONG   
20110101020822.000|20110101020825.000|CC1|THE GULF COAST.                 
20110101020825.000|20110101020828.000|CC1|IT BEGAN WITH A BLAST.          
20110101020828.000|20110101020829.000|CC1|B.P.'S DEEPWATER HORIZON RIG    
20110101020829.000|20110101020830.000|CC1|ABOUT 41 MILES OFF LOUISIANA'S  
20110101020830.000|20110101020832.000|CC1|COAST, EXPLODED APRIL 20th,     
20110101020832.000|20110101020833.000|CC1|KILLING ELEVEN AND INJURING     
20110101020833.000|20110101020837.000|CC1|SEVENTEEN.                      
20110101020837.000|20110101020839.000|CC1|AT FIRST, B.P. AND U.S.         
20110101020839.000|20110101020840.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS SAID THEY  
20110101020840.000|20110101020841.000|CC1|DIDN'T KNOW THE EXTENT OF THE   
20110101020841.000|20110101020843.000|CC1|SPILLND WERE SLOW TO RAISE      
20110101020843.000|20110101020845.000|CC1|ALARMS ABOUT IT.                
20110101020845.000|20110101020846.000|CC1|BUT WITHIN WEEKS, ESTIMATES OF  
20110101020846.000|20110101020849.000|CC1|ITS SIZE CLIMBED FROM 42,000    
20110101020849.000|20110101020851.000|CC1|GALLONS TO AS MUCH AS 2.4       
20110101020851.000|20110101020852.000|CC1|MILLION GALLONS GUSHING DAILY   
20110101020852.000|20110101020856.000|CC1|INTO THE WATER.                 
20110101020856.000|20110101020858.000|CC1|THE SPILL FOULED WETLANDS, AND  
20110101020858.000|20110101020900.000|CC1|COATED WILDLIFE, AFFECTING      
20110101020900.000|20110101020902.000|CC1|SHORELINES FROM LOUISIANA TO    
20110101020902.000|20110101020904.000|CC1|FLORIDA.                        
20110101020904.000|20110101020905.000|CC1|CHEMICAL DISPERSANTS WERE USED  
20110101020905.000|20110101020907.000|CC1|TO BREAK UP THE OIL, CREATING   
20110101020907.000|20110101020908.000|CC1|CLOUD-LIKE PLUMES BENEATH THE   
20110101020908.000|20110101020910.000|CC1|SURFACE.

20110101021312.000|20110101021313.000|CC1|OIL?                            
20110101021313.000|20110101021314.000|CC1|>> OIL IS VERY COMPLEX          
20110101021314.000|20110101021316.000|CC1|SUBSTANCE.                      
20110101021316.000|20110101021317.000|CC1|IT'S COMPOSED OF A LOT OF       
20110101021317.000|20110101021318.000|CC1|DIFFERENT TYPES OF              
20110101021318.000|20110101021319.000|CC1|HYDROCARBONS.                   
20110101021319.000|20110101021321.000|CC1|SOME OF THEM VOLATILIZE         
20110101021321.000|20110101021323.000|CC1|EASILY, SOME OF THAT BREAK      
20110101021323.000|20110101021325.000|CC1|DOWN ARE EASILY BIODEGRADED     
20110101021325.000|20110101021327.000|CC1|QUICKLY.                        
20110101021327.000|20110101021329.000|CC1|OTHERS BIODEGRADE ONLY VERY,    
20110101021329.000|20110101021330.000|CC1|VERY SLOWLY.                    
20110101021330.000|20110101021331.000|CC1|SO IN THAT ENVIRONMENT THAT     
20110101021331.000|20110101021332.000|CC1|YOU DESCRIBE DEEP IN THE        
20110101021332.000|20110101021334.000|CC1|OCEAN, IT'S QUITE LIKELY        
20110101021334.000|20110101021335.000|CC1|THAT SOME OF THAT RES I DUE     
20110101021335.000|20110101021337.000|CC1|WILL REMAIN FOR-- RESIDUE       
20110101021337.000|20110101021339.000|CC1|WILL REMAIN FOR YEARS IF NOT    
20110101021339.000|20110101021340.000|CC1|DECADES.                        
20110101021340.000|20110101021341.000|CC1|>> Suarez: IS THE GULF OF       
20110101021341.000|20110101021342.000|CC1|MEXICO DIFFERENT FROM THE       
20110101021342.000|20110101021344.000|CC1|OPEN OCEAN IN THAT THERE IS     
20110101021344.000|20110101021346.000|CC1|NOT AS MUCH WATER EXCHANGE,     
20110101021346.000|20110101021347.000|CC1|NOT AS MUCH FLUSHING OUT        
20110101021347.000|20110101021349.000|CC1|THAT GOES ON BECAUSE IT'S IN    
20110101021349.000|20110101021350.000|CC1|SOME PARTS CLOSED?              
20110101021350.000|20110101021353.000|CC1|>> THE GULF IS A HUGE AREA.     
20110101021353.000|20110101021355.000|CC1|AND THE AREA IN WHICH THE       
20110101021355.000|20110101021358.000|CC1|OIL WAS SPILLED IS JUST A       
20110101021358.000|20110101021400.000|CC1|VERY LARGE VOLUME.              
20110101021400.000|20110101021402.000|CC1|THERE IS CIRCULATION IN TO      
20110101021402.000|20110101021404.000|CC1|AND OUT OF THE GULF.            
20110101021404.000|20110101021407.000|CC1|BUT IT IS FAIRLY                
20110101021407.000|20110101021408.000|CC1|SELF-CONTAINED.                 
20110101021408.000|20110101021410.000|CC1|WE DID NOT HAVE ANY MAJOR       
20110101021410.000|20110101021410.000|CC1|HURRICANES THAT CAME INTO       
20110101021410.000|20110101021412.000|CC1|THE GULF AND THE LOOP           
20110101021412.000|20110101021415.000|CC1|CURRENT WHICH CAN ACT TO        
20110101021415.000|20110101021417.000|CC1|TRANSPORT WATER AND             
20110101021417.000|20110101021418.000|CC1|POTENTIALLY OIL AWAY FROM       
20110101021418.000|20110101021421.000|CC1|THE GULF WITHIN A FORM WHERE    
20110101021421.000|20110101021422.000|CC1|IT DIDN'T DO THAT.              
20110101021422.000|20110101021424.000|CC1|SO MUCH OF THE OIL THAT WAS     
20110101021424.000|20110101021428.000|CC1|SPILLED, IF IT WASN'T           
20110101021428.000|20110101021430.000|CC1|COLLECTED AND RECAPTURED, IT    
20110101021430.000|20110101021432.000|CC1|DID REMAIN IN THE GULF AND      
20110101021432.000|20110101021434.000|CC1|IS IN THE PROCESS OF BEING      
20110101021434.000|20110101021436.000|CC1|DEGRADED OR THE CLEANUP         
20110101021436.000|20110101021438.000|CC1|EFFORT HAS GOT IT.              
20110101021438.000|20110101021439.000|CC1|>> Suarez: A LOT OF             
20110101021439.000|20110101021440.000|CC1|ATTENTION WAS PAID TO THE       
20110101021440.000|20110101021442.000|CC1|DISBURSEMENT ANT, THE           
20110101021442.000|20110101021443.000|CC1|CHEMICALS THAT WERE DROPPED     
20110101021443.000|20110101021444.000|CC1|INTO THE WATER TO BREAK UP      
20110101021444.000|20110101021444.000|CC1|THAT OIL.                       
20110101021444.000|20110101021446.000|CC1|THIS TIME ON, DO WE HAVE ANY    
20110101021446.000|20110101021448.000|CC1|COMMON WISDOM ABOUT WHETHER     
20110101021448.000|20110101021450.000|CC1|TOO MUCH, NOT ENOUGH WAS        
20110101021450.000|20110101021451.000|CC1|USED, WHETHER IT WAS THE        
20110101021451.000|20110101021453.000|CC1|RIGHT APPROACH CHEMICALLY,      
20110101021453.000|20110101021454.000|CC1|WHETHER IT CAN BE SAFELY        
20110101021454.000|20110101021456.000|CC1|USED IN A BODY OF WATER FROM    
20110101021456.000|20110101021458.000|CC1|WHICH WE ALSO EAT MILLIONS      
20110101021458.000|20110101021500.000|CC1|OF POUNDS OF FOOD A YEAR?       
20110101021500.000|20110101021504.000|CC1|>> WE KNOW, RAY, THAT THE       
20110101021504.000|20110101021507.000|CC1|USE OF THE DISPERSANTS WAS      
20110101021507.000|20110101021509.000|CC1|INTENDED TO DO TWO THINGS.      
20110101021509.000|20110101021511.000|CC1|ONE TO KEEP THE OIL OFF         
20110101021511.000|20110101021513.000|CC1|BEACHES ANDES WEARS WHERE WE    
20110101021513.000|20110101021515.000|CC1|KNEW IT WOULD DO DAMAGE AND     
20110101021515.000|20110101021516.000|CC1|TWO TO BREAK UP THE OIL INTO    
20110101021516.000|20110101021518.000|CC1|SMALLER AND SMALLER PIECES      
20110101021518.000|20110101021519.000|CC1|SO IT COULD NATURALLY           
20110101021519.000|20110101021520.000|CC1|BIODEGRADE MUCH FASTER.         
20110101021520.000|20110101021521.000|CC1|IT WAS SUCCESSFUL IN DOING      
20110101021521.000|20110101021523.000|CC1|BOTH OF THOSE.                  
20110101021523.000|20110101021525.000|CC1|WE ALSO KNOW THAT THE           
20110101021525.000|20110101021526.000|CC1|DISPERSANTS BREAK DOWN          
20110101021526.000|20110101021528.000|CC1|RELATIVELY RAPIDLY BETWEEN      
20110101021528.000|20110101021530.000|CC1|FOUR AND SIX DAYS.              
20110101021530.000|20110101021533.000|CC1|IT BREAKS DOWN AND IS GONE.     
20110101021533.000|20110101021537.000|CC1|AND SO THERE IS NO THREAT TO    
20110101021537.000|20110101021540.000|CC1|SEAFOOD SAFETY, FOR EXAMPLE.    
20110101021540.000|20110101021542.000|CC1|AND WHETHER ON BALANCE THE      
20110101021542.000|20110101021544.000|CC1|USE OF DISPERSANTS WAS          
20110101021544.000|20110101021546.000|CC1|APPROPRIATE IS PART OF THE      
20110101021546.000|20110101021547.000|CC1|ONGOING QUESTIONS THAT WILL     
20110101021547.000|20110101021548.000|CC1|BE ASKED.                       
20110101021548.000|20110101021549.000|CC1|IT CERTAINLY DID WHAT WE        
20110101021549.000|20110101021551.000|CC1|EXPECTED IT TO DO, WHAT IT      
20110101021551.000|20110101021552.000|CC1|WAS INTENDED TO DO.             
20110101021552.000|20110101021554.000|CC1|BUT THIS IS A QUESTION OF       
20110101021554.000|20110101021556.000|CC1|ENVIRONMENTAL TRADE-OFF.        
20110101021556.000|20110101021558.000|CC1|AND YOU KNOW, YOU'RE FACED      
20110101021558.000|20110101021601.000|CC1|WITH THINGS THAT ARE BAD ON     
20110101021601.000|20110101021602.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES.                     
20110101021602.000|20110101021603.000|CC1|AND THE CHOICE THAT WAS MADE    
20110101021603.000|20110101021606.000|CC1|I THINK WAS THE RIGHT           
20110101021606.000|20110101021607.000|CC1|CHOICE.                         
20110101021607.000|20110101021608.000|CC1|>> Suarez: EARLY ON DID THE     
20110101021608.000|20110101021609.000|CC1|UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT        
20110101021609.000|20110101021611.000|CC1|MISUNDERSTAND OR MISSTATE       
20110101021611.000|20110101021612.000|CC1|THE MAGAZINE                    
20110101021612.000|20110101021613.000|CC1|FUTURE-- MAGNITUDE OF WHAT      
20110101021613.000|20110101021614.000|CC1|WAS GOING ON AT THE BOTTOM      
20110101021614.000|20110101021615.000|CC1|OF THE GULF OF MEXICO.          
20110101021615.000|20110101021617.000|CC1|AND HAD THERE BEEN A GREATER    
20110101021617.000|20110101021618.000|CC1|UNDERSTANDING EARLIER, WOULD    
20110101021618.000|20110101021620.000|CC1|WE AS A PEOPLE HAVE DONE        
20110101021620.000|20110101021621.000|CC1|ANYTHING DIFFERENTLY?           
20110101021621.000|20110101021623.000|CC1|>> I THINK EARLY ON IT WAS      
20110101021623.000|20110101021625.000|CC1|HARD TO TELL EXACTLY HOW        
20110101021625.000|20110101021627.000|CC1|SERIOUS THE SITUATION WAS.      
20110101021627.000|20110101021629.000|CC1|FOR THAT VERY REASON THE        
20110101021629.000|20110101021631.000|CC1|PRESIDENT ORDERED ALL OF THE    
20110101021631.000|20110101021634.000|CC1|AGENCIES TO MOUNT A VERY        
20110101021634.000|20110101021636.000|CC1|AGGRESSIVE RESPONSE AND TO      
20110101021636.000|20110101021638.000|CC1|ASSUME THE WORST POSSIBLE       
20110101021638.000|20110101021639.000|CC1|SCENARIO.                       
20110101021639.000|20110101021641.000|CC1|THAT, IN FACT, CHARACTERIZED    
20110101021641.000|20110101021642.000|CC1|THE FEDERAL EFFORT.             
20110101021642.000|20110101021644.000|CC1|I THINK IT'S IMPORTANT TO       
20110101021644.000|20110101021646.000|CC1|RECOGNIZE THAT THE MAGNITUDE    
20110101021646.000|20110101021647.000|CC1|OF THE SPILL WAS                
20110101021647.000|20110101021649.000|CC1|UNPRECEDENTED IN U.S.           
20110101021649.000|20110101021650.000|CC1|HISTORY.                        
20110101021650.000|20110101021652.000|CC1|FIVE MILLION BARRELS, THAT'S    
20110101021652.000|20110101021654.000|CC1|18 EXXON VALDEZ OIL SPILLS      
20110101021654.000|20110101021656.000|CC1|AND IT JUST KEPT COMING AND     
20110101021656.000|20110101021657.000|CC1|COMING AND COMING.              
20110101021657.000|20110101021659.000|CC1|EARLY ON, THERE WAS NO WAY      
20110101021659.000|20110101021700.000|CC1|TO KNOW HOW LONG IT WOULD       
20110101021700.000|20110101021703.000|CC1|TAKE TO CAP THE WELL AND TO     
20110101021703.000|20110101021704.000|CC1|STOP THE FLOW.                  
20110101021704.000|20110101021707.000|CC1|AND SO THIS VERY AGGRESSIVE     
20110101021707.000|20110101021710.000|CC1|RESPONSE, IN FACT, I BELIEVE    
20110101021710.000|20110101021712.000|CC1|WAS AS MUCH AS WE COULD HAVE    
20110101021712.000|20110101021715.000|CC1|DONE AND IN FACT, DID           
20110101021715.000|20110101021717.000|CC1|ACCOMPLISH A PHENOMENAL         
20110101021717.000|20110101021717.000|CC1|AMOUNT.                         
20110101021717.000|20110101021719.000|CC1|THE SHEER MAGNITUDE OF THE

20110101021723.000|20110101021725.000|CC1|RESULTED IN A LOT OF THE

20110101021732.000|20110101021733.000|CC1|>> Suarez: DR. LUBCHENCO,

20110101021734.000|20110101021738.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU, RAY.              
20110101021738.000|20110101021739.000|CC1|>> Brown: AS WE HEARD,          
20110101021739.000|20110101021740.000|CC1|SCIENTISTS ARE STILL ASSESSING  
20110101021740.000|20110101021741.000|CC1|THE LONG-TERM DAMAGE TO THE     
20110101021741.000|20110101021747.000|CC1|GULF.                           
20110101021747.000|20110101021749.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ON A BITINGLY COLD 
20110101021749.000|20110101021750.000|CC1|DECEMBER DAY, BIOLOGY ASSISTANT 
20110101021750.000|20110101021751.000|CC1|PROFESSOR ANTHONY OVERTON BRAVED
20110101021751.000|20110101021753.000|CC1|THE WIND AND THE WAVES MILES OFF
20110101021753.000|20110101021754.000|CC1|THE COAST OF ALABAMA, COLLECTING
20110101021754.000|20110101021759.000|CC1|MICROSCOPIC BABY FISH.          
20110101021759.000|20110101021800.000|CC1|AGAIN AND AGAIN, OVERTON AND HIS
20110101021800.000|20110101021801.000|CC1|CREW HEAVED A FINELY-MESHED     
20110101021801.000|20110101021802.000|CC1|DOUBLE NET ARRAY OVER THE SIDE  
20110101021802.000|20110101021807.000|CC1|OF A 27-FOOT ALUMINUM BOAT.     
20110101021807.000|20110101021808.000|CC1|THIS IS ONE OF EIGHT EXCURSIONS 
20110101021808.000|20110101021810.000|CC1|TO CATCH MENHADDEN LARVAE-- THE 
20110101021810.000|20110101021811.000|CC1|NEXT GENERATION OF A SPECIES    
20110101021811.000|20110101021812.000|CC1|THAT IS A PRIME SOURCE OF FISH  
20110101021812.000|20110101021813.000|CC1|OIL FOR HUMANS AND FOOD FOR     
20110101021813.000|20110101021816.000|CC1|PREDATORS.                      
20110101021816.000|20110101021817.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENS TO MENHADEN EFFECTS
20110101021817.000|20110101021820.000|CC1|THE ENTIRE FOOD CHAIN.          
20110101021820.000|20110101021820.000|CC1|OVERTON AND HIS COLLEAGUES ARE  
20110101021820.000|20110101021822.000|CC1|TRYING TO FIND OUT IF THE B.P.  
20110101021822.000|20110101021824.000|CC1|OIL SPILL AND THE DISPERSANT    
20110101021824.000|20110101021825.000|CC1|CHEMICALS THAT WERE USED TO     
20110101021825.000|20110101021826.000|CC1|BREAK UP THE SLICK HAVE DONE    
20110101021826.000|20110101021827.000|CC1|BIOLOGICAL DAMAGE TO THIS       
20110101021827.000|20110101021830.000|CC1|CORNERSTONE SPECIES.            
20110101021830.000|20110101021831.000|CC1|OVERTON SAYS THIS PARTICULAR    
20110101021831.000|20110101021842.000|CC1|FISH IS ABUNDANT IN THE GULF.   
20110101021842.000|20110101021843.000|CC1|>> THE ADULTS HAVE BEEN EXPOSED 
20110101021843.000|20110101021844.000|CC1|MUCH OF THE OIL THROUGHOUT THE  
20110101021844.000|20110101021844.000|CC1|SPILL REGION, AND IF THERE'S ANY
20110101021844.000|20110101021845.000|CC1|OIL STILL LEFT AROUND IN THE    
20110101021845.000|20110101021846.000|CC1|SURFACE WATERS, THEN MOST LIKELY
20110101021846.000|20110101021847.000|CC1|THEIR EGGS AND LARVAE, WHICH ARE
20110101021847.000|20110101021848.000|CC1|SPAWNING RIGHT NOW, WOULD BE    
20110101021848.000|20110101021849.000|CC1|EXPOSED, SO IT SPANS SUCH A     
20110101021849.000|20110101021851.000|CC1|LARGE COVERAGE AREA.            
20110101021851.000|20110101021852.000|CC1|IF WE WERE TO SEE ANY EFFECTS ON
20110101021852.000|20110101021853.000|CC1|A PARTICULAR SPECIES, WE'D MOST 
20110101021853.000|20110101021855.000|CC1|LIKELY SEE IT WITH THAT SPECIES.
20110101021855.000|20110101021857.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEY ALLOWED THE   
20110101021857.000|20110101021859.000|CC1|NETS TO SINK DOWN ABOUT 90 FEET,
20110101021859.000|20110101021859.000|CC1|THEN WINCHED THEM BACK UP AT    
20110101021859.000|20110101021901.000|CC1|TWO-MINUTE INTERVALS.           
20110101021901.000|20110101021903.000|CC1|OVERTON THEN SLUICED WHAT THE   
20110101021903.000|20110101021904.000|CC1|NET HAD TRAPPED INTO PLASTIC    
20110101021904.000|20110101021906.000|CC1|SAMPLE JARS.                    
20110101021906.000|20110101021906.000|CC1|THEY DID IT SIX TIMES IN SIX    
20110101021906.000|20110101021908.000|CC1|DIFFERENT, CAREFULLY RECORDED   
20110101021908.000|20110101021910.000|CC1|LOCATIONS.                      
20110101021910.000|20110101021911.000|CC1|>> WE WANT TO MAKE SURE THAT WE 
20110101021911.000|20110101021912.000|CC1|SAMPLE THE ENTIRE WATER COLUMN  
20110101021912.000|20110101021914.000|CC1|SO THAT WE CAPTURE LARVAE       
20110101021914.000|20110101021916.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE WATER COLUMN.    
20110101021916.000|20110101021917.000|CC1|SO THAT'S WHY IT'S DESIGNED SO  
20110101021917.000|20110101021919.000|CC1|THAT WE SORT OF PULL THE NET UP 
20110101021919.000|20110101021920.000|CC1|THROUGH THE WATER.              
20110101021920.000|20110101021922.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEY'RE            
20110101021922.000|20110101021924.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY FOCUSED ON HOW THE 
20110101021924.000|20110101021925.000|CC1|TINY FISH'S GENETIC STRUCTURE   
20110101021925.000|20110101021926.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE BEEN AFFECTED.       
20110101021926.000|20110101021927.000|CC1|>> GENES ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR    
20110101021927.000|20110101021929.000|CC1|EVERYTHING, IN TERMS OF PROTEIN 
20110101021929.000|20110101021931.000|CC1|PRODUCTION, DEVELOPMENT.        
20110101021931.000|20110101021932.000|CC1|THEY'RE RESPONSIBLE FOR EVERY   
20110101021932.000|20110101021937.000|CC1|PROCESS THAT OCCURS IN THE BODY.
20110101021937.000|20110101021938.000|CC1|SO ANY MAJOR CHANGES OR         
20110101021938.000|20110101021939.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY POTENTIAL CHANGES  
20110101021939.000|20110101021942.000|CC1|IN GENE EXPRESSION COULD CAUSE  
20110101021942.000|20110101021943.000|CC1|MAJOR IMPACT IN TERMS OF THE    
20110101021943.000|20110101021945.000|CC1|DEVELOPMENT AND POSSIBLY THE    
20110101021945.000|20110101021946.000|CC1|SURVIVABILITY OF A FISH.        
20110101021946.000|20110101021949.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BACK ON SHORE,     
20110101021949.000|20110101021951.000|CC1|OVERTON PREPARED THE DAY'S CATCH
20110101021951.000|20110101021952.000|CC1|FOR SHIPMENT BACK TO EAST

20110101021958.000|20110101021959.000|CC1|FACULTY AND STUDENTS WILL       
20110101021959.000|20110101022001.000|CC1|CAREFULLY SORT, CLASSIFY, AND   
20110101022001.000|20110101022002.000|CC1|EXAMINE THE MEHNADEN LARVAE,    
20110101022002.000|20110101022003.000|CC1|CATALOGING ANY DAMAGE THEY MIGHT
20110101022003.000|20110101022007.000|CC1|FIND.                           
20110101022007.000|20110101022008.000|CC1|BACK AT E.C.U., THE PROJECT HAS

20110101022009.000|20110101022011.000|CC1|OCTOBER, WHEN ASSISTANT         
20110101022011.000|20110101022012.000|CC1|PROFESSOR ED STELLWAG STARTED   
20110101022012.000|20110101022013.000|CC1|WHAT AMOUNTS TO A SMALL FISH    
20110101022013.000|20110101022015.000|CC1|FARM.                           
20110101022015.000|20110101022016.000|CC1|THE RESEARCH TEAM NEEDED ANOTHER
20110101022016.000|20110101022018.000|CC1|SPECIES OF FISH LARVAE THAT     
20110101022018.000|20110101022019.000|CC1|COULD BE EXPOSED TO CONTROLLED  
20110101022019.000|20110101022021.000|CC1|AMOUNTS OF OIL AND DISPERSANTS  
20110101022021.000|20110101022022.000|CC1|IN THE LABORATORY TO COMPARE    
20110101022022.000|20110101022023.000|CC1|WITH THE FISH TAKEN FROM THE    
20110101022023.000|20110101022025.000|CC1|GULF.                           
20110101022025.000|20110101022026.000|CC1|STELLWAG SET UP AN ARRAY OF FISH
20110101022026.000|20110101022028.000|CC1|TANKS TO SPAWN ZEBRAFISH-- A    
20110101022028.000|20110101022030.000|CC1|SMALL, WELL-STUDIED SPECIES THAT
20110101022030.000|20110101022033.000|CC1|PRODUCES NEW LARVAE EVERY DAY.  
20110101022033.000|20110101022039.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE REASONS IT WAS    
20110101022039.000|20110101022039.000|CC1|THE LARVAE FALL TO THE BOTTOM OF
20110101022039.000|20110101022040.000|CC1|THE TANKS, WHERE MARBLES PREVENT
20110101022040.000|20110101022041.000|CC1|THE ADULTS FROM EATING THEM.    
20110101022041.000|20110101022042.000|CC1|STELLWAG RETRIEVES THEM WITH A  
20110101022042.000|20110101022045.000|CC1|SIMPLE SIPHON.                  
20110101022045.000|20110101022046.000|CC1|>> WE'RE GETTING ABOUT 800 TO   
20110101022046.000|20110101022047.000|CC1|1,000 EMBRYOS, AND THEN WE      
20110101022047.000|20110101022047.000|CC1|CULTURE THEM, AND OF COURSE     
20110101022047.000|20110101022048.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO CONTINUE TO GROW 
20110101022048.000|20110101022049.000|CC1|THOSE UNTIL WE BUILD UP A LARGE 
20110101022049.000|20110101022050.000|CC1|ENOUGH STOCK.                   
20110101022050.000|20110101022051.000|CC1|AND THEN WE CAN EACH DAY LOOK AT
20110101022051.000|20110101022055.000|CC1|THEM AND MONITOR THEIR PROGRESS.
20110101022055.000|20110101022056.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SO ARE YOU KIND OF 
20110101022056.000|20110101022057.000|CC1|A MIDWIFE FOR ZEBRA FISH?       
20110101022057.000|20110101022059.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110101022059.000|20110101022100.000|CC1|AT THIS POINT, MY STUDENTS AND  
20110101022100.000|20110101022102.000|CC1|I, YEAH.                        
20110101022102.000|20110101022106.000|CC1|THESE WERE SPAWNED ON SUNDAY,   
20110101022106.000|20110101022108.000|CC1|AND WHAT I'M GOING TO SHOW YOU  
20110101022108.000|20110101022112.000|CC1|HERE IS HOW SOME OF THEM HAVE   
20110101022112.000|20110101022114.000|CC1|DIED, THEY NATURALLY DO.        
20110101022114.000|20110101022116.000|CC1|>> WHAT KILLED SOME OF THESE?   
20110101022116.000|20110101022116.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE JUST NATURALLY       
20110101022116.000|20110101022117.000|CC1|DEVELOPMENTALLY DEFECTIVE.      
20110101022117.000|20110101022118.000|CC1|NOTHING IN PARTICULAR.          
20110101022118.000|20110101022119.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENS, THOUGH, IS THAT   
20110101022119.000|20110101022121.000|CC1|WHEN THEY DIE THEY BECOME VERY  
20110101022121.000|20110101022125.000|CC1|SUSCEPTIBLE TO MOLD, AND FUNGUS.
20110101022125.000|20110101022127.000|CC1|IF THE FUNGUS STARTS TO SPREAD  
20110101022127.000|20110101022130.000|CC1|IT CAN WIPE OUT A LOT OF THEM.  
20110101022130.000|20110101022132.000|CC1|THE EYES ARE PROMINENT AT THIS  
20110101022132.000|20110101022134.000|CC1|STAGE, AND THEY'LL CONTINUE TO  
20110101022134.000|20110101022136.000|CC1|BE THAT FOR AWHILE.             
20110101022136.000|20110101022136.000|CC1|>> Reporter: STELLWAG HOPES THE 
20110101022136.000|20110101022138.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION WILL PROVIDE      
20110101022138.000|20110101022139.000|CC1|USEFUL INFORMATION ON HOW BEST  
20110101022139.000|20110101022141.000|CC1|TO DEAL WITH THE NEXT OIL SPILL.
20110101022141.000|20110101022143.000|CC1|>> IT'S POSSIBLE THAT WHAT WE   
20110101022143.000|20110101022144.000|CC1|COULD DO IS BE ABLE TO GIVE SOME
20110101022144.000|20110101022146.000|CC1|INFORMATION BACK TO THE PEOPLE

20110101022152.000|20110101022155.000|CC1|SHOULD WE USE DISPERSANTS, WHAT 
20110101022155.000|20110101022159.000|CC1|EFFECT IS THAT GOING TO HAVE?   
20110101022159.000|20110101022200.000|CC1|>> Reporter: COULD IT ALSO HELP 
20110101022200.000|20110101022201.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND THE EFFECTS ON HUMANS
20110101022201.000|20110101022203.000|CC1|WHO LIVE IN THAT ENVIRONMENT?   
20110101022203.000|20110101022203.000|CC1|>> WELL, CERTAINLY.

20110101022913.000|20110101022914.000|CC1|THE WORST THING THAT CAN HAPPEN 
20110101022914.000|20110101022915.000|CC1|IS THE FORECLOSURE BECAUSE THEN 
20110101022915.000|20110101022916.000|CC1|YOU STAY IN THE HOUSE AS LONG AS
20110101022916.000|20110101022917.000|CC1|YOU CAN, YOU DON'T MAKE ANY     
20110101022917.000|20110101022919.000|CC1|PAYMENTS ON IT, YOU LET IT      
20110101022919.000|20110101022920.000|CC1|DETERIORATE, WHEN YOU MOVE OUT  
20110101022920.000|20110101022921.000|CC1|THE TRUCK COMES IN AND TAKES THE
20110101022921.000|20110101022924.000|CC1|COPPER OUT OF IT.

20110101022929.000|20110101022931.000|CC1|EXTRA COSTS.

20110101024153.000|20110101024154.000|CC1|THE PROTECTIONS IF YOU HAVE     
20110101024154.000|20110101024155.000|CC1|A PREEXISTING CONDITION, FOR    
20110101024155.000|20110101024157.000|CC1|EXAMPLE, A LOT OF OTHER         
20110101024157.000|20110101024158.000|CC1|SPECIFICS IN THE LAW THAT       
20110101024158.000|20110101024200.000|CC1|POLL MUCH BETTER THAN THE       
20110101024200.000|20110101024201.000|CC1|IDEA OF THE HEALTH CARE LAW     
20110101024201.000|20110101024202.000|CC1|AS A WHOLE.                     
20110101024202.000|20110101024204.000|CC1|>> LAST MINUTE, DOW WANT TO     
20110101024204.000|20110101024206.000|CC1|MAKE NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS     
20110101024206.000|20110101024207.000|CC1|FOR AMERICAN POLITICS, YOU      
20110101024207.000|20110101024208.000|CC1|CAN GO FIRST.                   
20110101024208.000|20110101024209.000|CC1|>> I DO THINK THIS WILL BE A    
20110101024209.000|20110101024211.000|CC1|YEAR OF AUSTERITY, THE FIRST    
20110101024211.000|20110101024213.000|CC1|OF A FEW YEARS OF AUSTERITY.    
20110101024213.000|20110101024214.000|CC1|I THINK IT WILL BE IMPORTANT    
20110101024214.000|20110101024216.000|CC1|FOR AMERICANS TO BE MATURE      
20110101024216.000|20110101024216.000|CC1|ABOUT THAT.                     
20110101024216.000|20110101024217.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT GOING TO BE ABLE      
20110101024217.000|20110101024219.000|CC1|TO DO THESE KINDS OF CUTS       
20110101024219.000|20110101024221.000|CC1|JUST WITH EASY CUTS.            
20110101024221.000|20110101024221.000|CC1|THINGS LIKE THE EDUCATION       
20110101024221.000|20110101024222.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT OR WHATEVER.         
20110101024222.000|20110101024224.000|CC1|THIS IS GOING TO INVOLVE        
20110101024224.000|20110101024225.000|CC1|ENTITLEMENTS.                   
20110101024225.000|20110101024226.000|CC1|AND AMERICANS ARE GOINGING      
20110101024226.000|20110101024227.000|CC1|TO HAVE TO BE ADULT ABOUT       
20110101024227.000|20110101024227.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20110101024227.000|20110101024230.000|CC1|IT'S GOING TO BE DIFFICULT.     
20110101024230.000|20110101024232.000|CC1|>> FOR DEMOCRATS MAKE THE       
20110101024232.000|20110101024233.000|CC1|MORAL CASE FOR WHAT YOU ARE     
20110101024233.000|20110101024234.000|CC1|DOING, REALIZE AND THIS IS      
20110101024234.000|20110101024235.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY TRUE OF THE          
20110101024235.000|20110101024236.000|CC1|PRESIDENT, THAT YOU HAVE TO     
20110101024236.000|20110101024238.000|CC1|EXPLAIN, YOU HAVE TO            
20110101024238.000|20110101024239.000|CC1|PERSUADE, INSPIRE.              
20110101024239.000|20110101024240.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS REMEMBER THAT       
20110101024240.000|20110101024241.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO GOVERN.             
20110101024241.000|20110101024243.000|CC1|AND THE GOVERNMENT IS NOT A     
20110101024243.000|20110101024244.000|CC1|BAD WORD.                       
20110101024244.000|20110101024245.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT COULD ACTUALLY       
20110101024245.000|20110101024247.000|CC1|SOLVE PROBLEMS AND PROMOTE      
20110101024247.000|20110101024248.000|CC1|FAIRNESS AND FAIRNESS SHOULD    
20110101024248.000|20110101024250.000|CC1|SHOULDN'T BE A BAD WORD         
20110101024250.000|20110101024250.000|CC1|EITHER.                         
20110101024250.000|20110101024252.000|CC1|FOR THE REST OF US, LET US      
20110101024252.000|20110101024253.000|CC1|AT LEAST BASE OUR ARGUMENTS     
20110101024253.000|20110101024254.000|CC1|ON FACT.                        
20110101024254.000|20110101024257.000|CC1|NO MORE DEATH PANEL.            
20110101024257.000|20110101024259.000|CC1|>> E.J. DIONNE MICHAEL          
20110101024259.000|20110101024300.000|CC1|GERSON, NICE TO TALK WITH       
20110101024300.000|20110101024301.000|CC1|YOU, AND HAPPY NEW YEAR.        
20110101024301.000|20110101024302.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.                   
20110101024302.000|20110101024307.000|CC1|>> NICE TO BE WITH YOU.         
20110101024307.000|20110101024308.000|CC1|>> Suarez: NEXT, A PROJECT TO   
20110101024308.000|20110101024311.000|CC1|PROTECT EARLY CHRISTIAN TEXTS   
20110101024311.000|20110101024312.000|CC1|FROM AGE, INSECTS AND WAR.      
20110101024312.000|20110101024313.000|CC1|SPECIAL CORRESPONDENT FRED DE   
20110101024313.000|20110101024319.000|CC1|SAM LAZARO REPORTS.             
20110101024319.000|20110101024320.000|CC1|>> WHO WOULD HAVE THOUGHT THAT A
20110101024320.000|20110101024322.000|CC1|MONASTERY IN CENTRAL MINNESOTA  
20110101024322.000|20110101024323.000|CC1|IS THE WORLD'S LARGEST          
20110101024323.000|20110101024324.000|CC1|COLLECTION OF PHOTOGRAPHS AND   
20110101024324.000|20110101024326.000|CC1|MANUSCRIPTS?                    
20110101024326.000|20110101024331.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FOR 50 YEARS, THIS 
20110101024331.000|20110101024332.000|CC1|UNDERGROUND LIBRARY AT ST. JOHNS
20110101024332.000|20110101024333.000|CC1|ABBEY HAS COLLECTED AND         
20110101024333.000|20110101024334.000|CC1|CATALOGUED HISTORIC CHRISTIAN   
20110101024334.000|20110101024334.000|CC1|MANUSCRIPTS.                    
20110101024334.000|20110101024335.000|CC1|FR. COLUMBA STEWART SAYS IT'S   
20110101024335.000|20110101024337.000|CC1|PART OF A MONASTIC TRADITION    
20110101024337.000|20110101024340.000|CC1|THAT DATES BACK TO THE 6th      
20110101024340.000|20110101024340.000|CC1|CENTURY.                        
20110101024340.000|20110101024341.000|CC1|>> I'M A BENEDICTINE MONK.      
20110101024341.000|20110101024342.000|CC1|THERE'S AN IMPULSE IN           
20110101024342.000|20110101024344.000|CC1|BENEDICTINES TO EXERCISE THIS   
20110101024344.000|20110101024348.000|CC1|ROLE OF CULTURAL GUARDIANSHIP,  
20110101024348.000|20110101024348.000|CC1|AND THAT'S AN IMPULSE THAT      
20110101024348.000|20110101024350.000|CC1|CONTINUES EVEN IN THE MODERN    
20110101024350.000|20110101024350.000|CC1|AGE.                            
20110101024350.000|20110101024352.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MANY OF THE TEXTS  
20110101024352.000|20110101024354.000|CC1|WERE HANDWRITTEN LONG BEFORE    
20110101024354.000|20110101024356.000|CC1|PRINTING PRESSES.               
20110101024356.000|20110101024401.000|CC1|SOME, LIKE THIS KORAN, WERE     
20110101024401.000|20110101024402.000|CC1|CREATED SOON AFTER.             
20110101024402.000|20110101024403.000|CC1|THIS ONE COMMISSIONED FOR STUDY 
20110101024403.000|20110101024403.000|CC1|BY SOME OF THE FIRST PROTESTANT 
20110101024403.000|20110101024405.000|CC1|SCHOLARS.                       
20110101024405.000|20110101024406.000|CC1|>> IT'S THE FIRST PRINTED COPY  
20110101024406.000|20110101024407.000|CC1|OF THE KORAN.                   
20110101024407.000|20110101024409.000|CC1|IT WAS PUBLISHED IN 1543 WITH A 
20110101024409.000|20110101024411.000|CC1|PREFACE BY MARTIN LUTHER.       
20110101024411.000|20110101024412.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FR. COLUMBA SAYS   
20110101024412.000|20110101024414.000|CC1|THESE ANCIENT TEXTS ECHO WITH   
20110101024414.000|20110101024416.000|CC1|RELEVANCE TO OUR TIME.          
20110101024416.000|20110101024418.000|CC1|CHRISTIANS WERE DEALING WITH    
20110101024418.000|20110101024419.000|CC1|ISLAM AND THERE WAS A REAL      
20110101024419.000|20110101024422.000|CC1|DESIRE TO UNDERSTAND IT BETTER. 
20110101024422.000|20110101024423.000|CC1|SO THE RESULT WAS THEY WANTED A 
20110101024423.000|20110101024424.000|CC1|TRANSLATION OF THE KORAN INTO   
20110101024424.000|20110101024426.000|CC1|LATIN.                          
20110101024426.000|20110101024428.000|CC1|SO THAT CHRISTIANS COULD READ IT
20110101024428.000|20110101024430.000|CC1|AND OF COURSE IT WASN'T FOR THE 
20110101024430.000|20110101024432.000|CC1|SAKE OF RELIGIOUS UNDERSTANDING,
20110101024432.000|20110101024433.000|CC1|IT WAS FOR THE SAKE OF          
20110101024433.000|20110101024436.000|CC1|REFUTATION.                     
20110101024436.000|20110101024436.000|CC1| THIS WHOLE QUESTION OF HOW     
20110101024436.000|20110101024438.000|CC1|WESTERN, PREDOMINANTLY CHRISTIAN
20110101024438.000|20110101024439.000|CC1|COUNTRIES DIALOG WITH OR RELATE 
20110101024439.000|20110101024443.000|CC1|TO A MAJORITY OF MUSLIM         
20110101024443.000|20110101024444.000|CC1|COUNTRIES IS SOMETHING WE'VE    
20110101024444.000|20110101024446.000|CC1|BEEN TALKING ABOUT SINCE 9/11.  
20110101024446.000|20110101024447.000|CC1|BUT WHAT WE FORGET IS THERE ARE 
20110101024447.000|20110101024449.000|CC1|CENTURIES OF EXPERIENCE OF      
20110101024449.000|20110101024451.000|CC1|CHRISTIANS AND MUSLIMS AND IN   
20110101024451.000|20110101024453.000|CC1|MANY OF THESE AREAS SIGNIFICANT 
20110101024453.000|20110101024454.000|CC1|JEWISH COMMUNITIES AS WELL,     
20110101024454.000|20110101024457.000|CC1|LIVING TOGETHER.                
20110101024457.000|20110101024458.000|CC1|AND IT WASN'T ALWAYS EASY.      
20110101024458.000|20110101024459.000|CC1|AND THESE MANUSCRIPTS TELL THE  
20110101024459.000|20110101024502.000|CC1|STORY OF LEGAL PRESCRIPTIONS    
20110101024502.000|20110101024506.000|CC1|WHICH WERE MADE EITHER TO       
20110101024506.000|20110101024507.000|CC1|PROTECT OR TO OPPRESS A         
20110101024507.000|20110101024511.000|CC1|PARTICULAR COMMUNITY.           
20110101024511.000|20110101024512.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PRESERVING THAT    
20110101024512.000|20110101024514.000|CC1|HISTORY IS A MATTER OF UTMOST   
20110101024514.000|20110101024515.000|CC1|IMPORTANCE TO RELIGIOUS SCHOLARS
20110101024515.000|20110101024517.000|CC1|LIKE FR. COLUMBA.               
20110101024517.000|20110101024518.000|CC1|>> IF YOU BELIEVE THAT WE CAN   
20110101024518.000|20110101024520.000|CC1|LEARN FROM THE PAST, THE PAST OF
20110101024520.000|20110101024521.000|CC1|OUR LIVES, THE PAST OF OUR      
20110101024521.000|20110101024522.000|CC1|FAMILIES AND OUR OWN NATION OR  
20110101024522.000|20110101024524.000|CC1|CULTURE.                        
20110101024524.000|20110101024526.000|CC1|THE ONLY WAY THE PAST HAS COME  
20110101024526.000|20110101024527.000|CC1|DOWN TO US IS IN THE FORM OF    
20110101024527.000|20110101024529.000|CC1|THESE WRITINGS.                 
20110101024529.000|20110101024533.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IMPRESSIVE AS THE  
20110101024533.000|20110101024534.000|CC1|PHYSICAL MANUSCRIPTS ARE, THIS  
20110101024534.000|20110101024535.000|CC1|LIBRARY'S MUCH LARGER COLLECTION
20110101024535.000|20110101024537.000|CC1|CONSISTS OF DIGITAL COPIES OF   
20110101024537.000|20110101024541.000|CC1|SACRED TEXTS.                   
20110101024541.000|20110101024542.000|CC1|MOST OF THE ORIGINALS REMAIN IN 
20110101024542.000|20110101024547.000|CC1|CHURCHES A WORLD AWAY FROM HERE.
20110101024547.000|20110101024549.000|CC1|>> OVER 100,000 MANUSCRIPTS FROM
20110101024549.000|20110101024551.000|CC1|EUROPE, THE MIDDLE EAST, FROM   
20110101024551.000|20110101024554.000|CC1|ETHIOPIA, FROM INDIA.           
20110101024554.000|20110101024556.000|CC1|WELL OVER 30, 40 MILLION PAGES, 
20110101024556.000|20110101024558.000|CC1|WE'VE LOST COUNT LONG AGO.      
20110101024558.000|20110101024559.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE TEXTS ARE      
20110101024559.000|20110101024600.000|CC1|RECORDED, CATALOGUED AND STORED 
20110101024600.000|20110101024603.000|CC1|IN UNDERGROUND VAULTS           
20110101024603.000|20110101024603.000|CC1|>> AND OUR PLEDGE IS THAT THOSE 
20110101024603.000|20110101024606.000|CC1|WILL BE SAFE, FOREVER.          
20110101024606.000|20110101024607.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE LIBRARY'S      
20110101024607.000|20110101024608.000|CC1|EFFORT BEGAN IN THE 1960s IN    
20110101024608.000|20110101024610.000|CC1|EUROPE, A TIME WHEN MICROFILM   
20110101024610.000|20110101024612.000|CC1|FIRST BECAME AVAILABLE, ALSO A  
20110101024612.000|20110101024613.000|CC1|TIME WHEN THERE WAS FEAR OF A   
20110101024613.000|20110101024616.000|CC1|NUCLEAR WAR.                    
20110101024616.000|20110101024617.000|CC1|NEXT THE LIBRARIANS WENT TO     
20110101024617.000|20110101024619.000|CC1|ETHIOPIA, ANTICIPATING          
20110101024619.000|20110101024621.000|CC1|CORRECTLY, THAT MANY OF THAT    
20110101024621.000|20110101024623.000|CC1|COUNTRY'S ORTHODOX MANUSCRIPTS  
20110101024623.000|20110101024624.000|CC1|COULD BE DESTROYED IN THE       
20110101024624.000|20110101024625.000|CC1|POLITICAL TURMOIL OF THE '70s   
20110101024625.000|20110101024628.000|CC1|AND '80s.                       
20110101024628.000|20110101024629.000|CC1|IN RECENT YEARS, THE FOCUS HAS  
20110101024629.000|20110101024631.000|CC1|BEEN ON THE MIDDLE EAST.        
20110101024631.000|20110101024633.000|CC1|>> OUR GOAL SINCE 2003 WAS TO DO
20110101024633.000|20110101024635.000|CC1|AS MANY EASTERN CHRISTIAN       
20110101024635.000|20110101024637.000|CC1|MANUSCRIPTS IN THE MIDDLE EAST  
20110101024637.000|20110101024639.000|CC1|AS POSSIBLE.                    
20110101024639.000|20110101024640.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE ALL KNOW THAT THESE  
20110101024640.000|20110101024641.000|CC1|MANUSCRIPTS ARE ENDANGERED FROM 
20110101024641.000|20110101024643.000|CC1|A VARIETY OF CAUSES.            
20110101024643.000|20110101024644.000|CC1|THE ONE PEOPLE THINK OF MOST IS 
20110101024644.000|20110101024646.000|CC1|VIOLENCE BECAUSE THEY ASSOCIATE 
20110101024646.000|20110101024650.000|CC1|THIS REGION, WHETHER ITS LEBANON
20110101024650.000|20110101024652.000|CC1|OR A PLACE LIKE JERUSALEM       
20110101024652.000|20110101024653.000|CC1|CERTAINLY A PLACE LIKE IRAQ WITH
20110101024653.000|20110101024655.000|CC1|IMMEDIATE PHYSICAL DANGER TO    
20110101024655.000|20110101024658.000|CC1|MANUSCRIPTS.                    
20110101024658.000|20110101024659.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE FOLLOWED FATHER 
20110101024659.000|20110101024701.000|CC1|COLUMBA TO JERUSALEM-- A CITY   
20110101024701.000|20110101024702.000|CC1|FOUGHT OVER FOR CENTURIES AMONG 
20110101024702.000|20110101024705.000|CC1|MUSLIMS, JEWS AND CHRISTIANS    
20110101024705.000|20110101024712.000|CC1|ALSO AMONG CHRISTIANS.          
20110101024712.000|20110101024713.000|CC1|THESE PILGRIMS WERE ON THEIR WAY
20110101024713.000|20110101024714.000|CC1|TO THE CHURCH OF THE HOLY       
20110101024714.000|20110101024716.000|CC1|SEPULCHRE WHERE THEY BELIEVE    
20110101024716.000|20110101024720.000|CC1|CHRIST WAS BURIED.              
20110101024720.000|20110101024721.000|CC1|>> I'M GOING TO SHOW YOU A      
20110101024721.000|20110101024723.000|CC1|DIAGRAM OF THE HOLY SEPULCHRE   
20110101024723.000|20110101024726.000|CC1|CHURCH.                         
20110101024726.000|20110101024726.000|CC1|ALL THAT REMAINS IS JUST THIS   
20110101024726.000|20110101024727.000|CC1|AREA.                           
20110101024727.000|20110101024729.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE BUILDING WAS   
20110101024729.000|20110101024730.000|CC1|DESTROYED BY MUSLIM RULERS AND  
20110101024730.000|20110101024731.000|CC1|REBUILT IN THE 13th CENTURY BY  
20110101024731.000|20110101024732.000|CC1|THE CRUSADERS.                  
20110101024732.000|20110101024733.000|CC1|IT IS ONE OF CHRISTIANITY'S     
20110101024733.000|20110101024735.000|CC1|HOLIEST SITES, ALSO A SYMBOL OF 
20110101024735.000|20110101024737.000|CC1|ITS DIVIDED FAMILY, SOMETHING   
20110101024737.000|20110101024738.000|CC1|THAT COMPLICATES THE TASK OF    
20110101024738.000|20110101024740.000|CC1|TRACKING DOWN AND DIGITIZING    
20110101024740.000|20110101024743.000|CC1|THEIR SACRED BOOKS.             
20110101024743.000|20110101024745.000|CC1|>> THE GREEKS HAVE THE CENTRAL  
20110101024745.000|20110101024746.000|CC1|PIECE, THE ARMENIANS HAVE QUITE 
20110101024746.000|20110101024749.000|CC1|A BIT OF THE CHAPEL SURROUNDING 
20110101024749.000|20110101024750.000|CC1|THE CENTER, THE LATINS HAVE THE 
20110101024750.000|20110101024753.000|CC1|FAR SIDE, THE SYRIANS HAVE A    
20110101024753.000|20110101024755.000|CC1|SMALL CHAPEL IN THE BACK, THE   
20110101024755.000|20110101024757.000|CC1|COPTS HAVE A SMALL CHAPEL       
20110101024757.000|20110101024759.000|CC1|INSIDE, SO IT'S A LITTLE        
20110101024759.000|20110101024801.000|CC1|MICROCOSM OF ALL THE TRADITIONS 
20110101024801.000|20110101024802.000|CC1|WE HAVE HERE IN THE MIDDLE EAST.
20110101024802.000|20110101024804.000|CC1|AND UNFORTUNATELY RELATIONS ARE 
20110101024804.000|20110101024806.000|CC1|NOT ALWAYS EASY, BECAUSE WHEN   
20110101024806.000|20110101024807.000|CC1|YOU HAVE ALL THESE DIFFERENT    
20110101024807.000|20110101024809.000|CC1|GROUPS LIVING IN WHAT IS A      
20110101024809.000|20110101024810.000|CC1|FAIRLY SMALL BUILDING, THEY'RE  
20110101024810.000|20110101024810.000|CC1|FIERCELY PROTECTIVE OF THEIR    
20110101024810.000|20110101024812.000|CC1|RIGHTS.                         
20110101024812.000|20110101024814.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MANY REGIONS WHERE 
20110101024814.000|20110101024816.000|CC1|THESE TRADITIONS EVOLVED-MODERN 
20110101024816.000|20110101024818.000|CC1|DAY TURKEY AND IRAQ, ARMENIA AND
20110101024818.000|20110101024821.000|CC1|RUSSIA TO THE NORTH, AS FAR     
20110101024821.000|20110101024822.000|CC1|SOUTH AS INDIA HAVE SEEN WAR AND
20110101024822.000|20110101024823.000|CC1|UPHEAVAL THROUGH THE AGES.      
20110101024823.000|20110101024825.000|CC1|AND JUST LAST OCTOBER A SYRIAC  
20110101024825.000|20110101024826.000|CC1|ORTHODOX CHURCH WAS BOMBED IN   
20110101024826.000|20110101024829.000|CC1|IRAQ                            
20110101024829.000|20110101024831.000|CC1|ALL THIS INCREASES THE URGENCY  
20110101024831.000|20110101024833.000|CC1|TO RECORD THE TEXTS THAT HAVE   
20110101024833.000|20110101024835.000|CC1|SURVIVED, SAYS FR. COLUMBA.     
20110101024835.000|20110101024836.000|CC1|HE IS PARTICULARLY INTERESTED IN
20110101024836.000|20110101024837.000|CC1|DIGITIZING THE SYRIAC CHURCHS   
20110101024837.000|20110101024844.000|CC1|COLLECTION IN JERUSALEM.        
20110101024844.000|20110101024847.000|CC1|IT WILL TAKE DOGGED DIPLOMACY.  
20110101024847.000|20110101024848.000|CC1|>> THESE EASTERN CHRISTIAN      
20110101024848.000|20110101024852.000|CC1|COMMUNITIES, MANY HAVE BEEN     
20110101024852.000|20110101024853.000|CC1|PERSECUTED, MASSACRES ARE WITHIN
20110101024853.000|20110101024855.000|CC1|LIVING MEMORY, THIS STUFF IS    
20110101024855.000|20110101024857.000|CC1|REALLY IN THEIR GUT SO YOU HAVE 
20110101024857.000|20110101024859.000|CC1|TO BUILD A RELATIONSHIP WHERE   
20110101024859.000|20110101024902.000|CC1|THEY UNDERSTAND THAT THE MOTIVES
20110101024902.000|20110101024903.000|CC1|THAT WE BRING TO THESE PROJECTS 
20110101024903.000|20110101024906.000|CC1|IS ONE OF DEEP REVERENCE.       
20110101024906.000|20110101024907.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE MINNESOTA      
20110101024907.000|20110101024908.000|CC1|LIBRARY ALSO BRINGS ALL THE     
20110101024908.000|20110101024910.000|CC1|MONEY NEEDED FOR SUCH PROJECTS--
20110101024910.000|20110101024911.000|CC1|SEVERAL HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS
20110101024911.000|20110101024912.000|CC1|EACH YEAR RAISED FROM VARIOUS   
20110101024912.000|20110101024914.000|CC1|PRIVATE DONORS.                 
20110101024914.000|20110101024915.000|CC1|LOCAL CHURCH STAFF ARE TRAINED  
20110101024915.000|20110101024917.000|CC1|IN THE TASKS.                   
20110101024917.000|20110101024917.000|CC1|AND WHILE COPIES GO TO          
20110101024917.000|20110101024918.000|CC1|MINNESOTA, THE LOCAL CHURCH     
20110101024918.000|20110101024922.000|CC1|RETAINS COPYRIGHT               
20110101024922.000|20110101024923.000|CC1|>> SO IF YOU HAVE A MONK OR A   
20110101024923.000|20110101024924.000|CC1|LAYPERSON WHO YOU THINK COULD DO
20110101024924.000|20110101024929.000|CC1|THIS WORK?                      
20110101024929.000|20110101024930.000|CC1|>> OUR MONKS ALWAYS, THEY WILL  
20110101024930.000|20110101024932.000|CC1|BE WITH THEM.                   
20110101024932.000|20110101024935.000|CC1|>> THIS IS A VERY OLD           
20110101024935.000|20110101024936.000|CC1|MANUSCRIPT, PERHAPS 7TH, 8TH    
20110101024936.000|20110101024941.000|CC1|CENTURY?

20110101024949.000|20110101024951.000|CC1|REPEATEDLY TO THE MIDDLE EAST-  
20110101024951.000|20110101024952.000|CC1|UNTIL, AS IT WERE, THE WORD IS  
20110101024952.000|20110101024955.000|CC1|MADE SAFE.

20110101025006.000|20110101025007.000|CC1|>> Brown: FINALLY TONIGHT,

20110101025016.000|20110101025018.000|CC1|VERSE IS TITLED "THE SHAPE IS   
20110101025018.000|20110101025023.000|CC1|SPACE."

20110101025034.000|20110101025036.000|CC1|?.                              
20110101025036.000|20110101025038.000|CC1|>> HE WRITES THE MAJORITY OF    
20110101025038.000|20110101025040.000|CC1|HIS WORK SO WHEN I'M CALLED

20110101025113.000|20110101025114.000|CC1|BRINGING A POEM ON TO A
